position: Senior Risk Analyst at American Express | Ex EY | MBA in Finance

positions.subtitle: American Express
positions.description: •	Facilitating strategic execution of the organization’s operational, regulatory and compliance testing. •	Experienced in identifying issues and deficiencies through testing, call monitoring, and processes.•	Partnering closely with key control teams to ensure a well-controlled and smooth business process. •	Maintaining internal control, and operational risks through continuous business and control testing.•	Delivering monthly periodic and ad hoc reporting against key business testing.•	Preparing key recommendations for business management about process improvement, best practices, risk reduction, and maximization of revenue.
positions.title: Lead Analyst - Risk Management
positions.description_html:
• Facilitating strategic execution of the organization’s operational, regulatory and compliance testing.
• Experienced in identifying issues and deficiencies through testing, call monitoring, and processes.
• Partnering closely with key control teams to ensure a well-controlled and smooth business process.
• Maintaining internal control, and operational risks through continuous business and control testing.
• Delivering monthly periodic and ad hoc reporting against key business testing.
• Preparing key recommendations for business management about process improvement, best practices, risk reduction, and maximization of revenue.

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: • Executed & documented financial statement work papers as defined by the engagement teams.• Executed audit testing of payables, receivables, revenues, investments, expenses, loans, etc.• Performed analytical procedures, engagement planning, testing, and reporting of transactions.• Identified accounting issues, clearly documented and reported the findings. • Worked on the audit of the top companies in the North America Region.• Coordinated with the global engagement team to understand significant business risks and various principles, guidelines, and processes.• Practical experience with various software such as EY Canvas, EY Audit Sampling Wizard, EY Random, EY Micro-start, EY General Ledger Analyzer, etc.
experience.description_html: • Executed & documented financial statement work papers as defined by the engagement teams.• Executed audit testing of payables, receivables, revenues, investments, expenses, loans, etc.• Performed analytical procedures, engagement planning, testing, and reporting of transactions.• Identified accounting issues, clearly documented and reported the findings. • Worked on the audit of the top companies in the North America Region.• Coordinated with the global engagement team to understand significant business risks and various principles, guidelines, and processes.• Practical experience with various software such as EY Canvas, EY Audit Sampling Wizard, EY Random, EY Micro-start, EY General Ledger Analyzer, etc.

experience.title: Global Operations Executive
experience.description: •  Maintained large datasets on applications within the Google Workspace/Suite.• Hands-on experience in CRM and CMS software like Zendesk and Drupal.• Practical experience in various software like Excel, PowerPoint, Power BI, and Adobe InDesign.• Handled 20 US customer tickets daily on an average with more than 90% accuracy.• Ensured flawless order processing and preparing daily progress reports.

experience.title: Research and Operations Analyst
experience.description: • Drafted a Research and Analysis report on the best 10 data centers in India.• Directed the contract of 50 vendors under the Vendor Management Project• Guided the onboarding, scheduling, and further delegation of 550 candidates in the defined TAT.

experience.title: Financial Planning and Reporting Analyst
experience.description: • Presented the Inventory receipts to support data-driven decision-making.• Facilitated the Payroll Management of 200 employees in the production department.• Standardized daily accounting reports of the vendors and manage their payment records.• Responsible for other duties such as financial reporting, financial analysis and day to day operations management.

honors_and_awards.title: Shaastraath
honors_and_awards.description: The event was organised by ICICI Bank in which top Industry experts shared their views and opinions about the new practices, norms, global economy, Indian economy, advancement in technology, and many other important topics. Many students from the top MBA colleges of India participated in the event. I was one among the top students who won in the quiz and received a certificate of excellence from ICICI bank.

honors_and_awards.description: Our team won the the third prize in the poster making competition on the topic of "Government schemes launched in india". We made the poster on "Make in India" scheme. MNNIT Director Prof. Rajeev Tripathi was the chief guest.
